A data transfer object (DTO) that encapsulates filter criteria for querying devices through the REST API. This class provides a structured way to specify multiple filtering parameters for device searches.

## Key Components

- **statuses** - Filter devices by their operational status (e.g., active, inactive)
- **deviceTypes** - Filter by device categories or classifications
- **osTypes** - Filter by operating system types (as string values)
- **organizationIds** - Filter devices belonging to specific organizations
- **tagNames** - Filter devices by associated tag names

## Usage Example

```java
// Create filter criteria for active mobile devices in specific organizations
DeviceFilterCriteria criteria = DeviceFilterCriteria.builder()
    .statuses(List.of(DeviceStatus.ACTIVE, DeviceStatus.ONLINE))
    .deviceTypes(List.of(DeviceType.MOBILE, DeviceType.TABLET))
    .osTypes(List.of("iOS", "Android"))
    .organizationIds(List.of("org-123", "org-456"))
    .tagNames(List.of("production", "field-device"))
    .build();

// Use with REST API service
List<Device> filteredDevices = deviceService.findDevices(criteria);
```

The class uses Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern implementation. Swagger annotations provide API documentation for each filter parameter.
